---
id: update-ticket-view
title: "Update ticket view"
description: "Updates an existing ticket view's configuration, including filters, column layout, sort order, page size, and sharing settings. If the view does not exist, a new view is created with the provided configuration."
sidebar_label: "Update ticket view"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "post api-method"
info_path: docs/api/tickets/tickets-api
custom_edit_url: null
---

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update ticket view"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/tickets/views/{viewId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates an existing ticket view's configuration, including filters, column layout, sort order, page size, and sharing settings. If the view does not exist, a new view is created with the provided configuration.

**Prerequisites**
1. **viewId** – Use [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/views](/docs/api/tickets/list-ticket-views) to list views and extract `Items[].ViewId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Get current: [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/views/\{viewId\}](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket-view) → retrieve existing configuration
2. Modify: Update filter criteria, columns, sort order, or sharing settings
3. Save: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/views/\{viewId\}](/docs/api/tickets/update-ticket-view) with updated definition
4. Verify: [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/views/\{viewId\}](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket-view) to confirm changes

**Request Body**: Provide complete `ViewDefinition` including `Name`, `Filters`, `Columns`, `Sort`, `PageSize`, and optionally `IsShared`.

**Use Cases**: Refining search criteria, adding/removing columns, changing default sort, sharing personal views with team.

**Note**: Only the view owner or administrators can update views. Updating shared views affects all users who use that view.

**Related Endpoints**
- [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/views/\{viewId\}](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket-view) – Get current view definition
- [DELETE /api/v1.0/tickets/views/\{viewId\}](/docs/api/tickets/delete-ticket-view) – Delete view
- [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/views/new](/docs/api/tickets/create-ticket-view) – Create new view instead

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"viewId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Identifier of the ticket view to update.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"example":"0c8f7039-1234-4e7f-9c22-11c25e7b45b2"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Full layout definition for a saved view, including filters, columns, sorting, and sharing metadata.","properties":{"ViewId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier for the saved view.","example":"0c8f7039-1234-4e7f-9c22-11c25e7b45b2"},"IsDeleted":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indicates whether the view has been soft-deleted.","example":false},"SiteId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Site that owns the view.","example":"b3f792ef-272b-4591-867a-357474046cdd"},"ProductId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Product context the view belongs to (ticketing, facilities, etc.).","example":"88df910c-91aa-e711-80c2-0004ffa00010"},"UserId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Owner of the view.","example":"25c1c3ac-0fb7-4214-84a7-87c723ac0052"},"AssetTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Asset type associated with the view when scoped to assets."},"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Display name shown to users.","example":"Agent SLA Compliance"},"ViewTypeId":{"type":"string","description":"Identifier of the view type (for example `Tickets.CustomView`).","example":"Tickets.CustomView"},"Filters":{"type":"array","description":"Filters applied when the view loads.","items":{"type":"object","description":"Filter applied to a saved view. Keys such as `CustomFieldTypeId` or `ComplexEditorPath` instruct the UI which editor to load.","properties":{"Key":{"type":"string","description":"Option name used by the grid renderer.","example":"CustomFieldTypeId"},"Value":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Optional option value. Many system columns leave this blank.","example":null}},"required":["Key","Value"],"title":"ViewColumnOption"}}},"required":["GridColumnId","ColumnIndex"],"example":{"GridColumnId":"$tickets.sla-resolution-time","ColumnIndex":1,"Options":[{"Key":"CustomFieldTypeId","Value":null},{"Key":"ComplexEditorPath","Value":null}]},"title":"ViewColumn"}},"DefaultTab":{"allOf":[{"type":"object","description":"Default label for the tab.","example":"Overview"}},"required":["Key","Title"],"title":"ViewTab"}],"description":"Default tab selection when the view renders tabbed layouts."},"Sort":{"allOf":[{"type":"object","description":"Sort configuration applied to a saved view.","properties":{"Field":{"type":"string","description":"Internal field name used by the API when ordering results.","example":"TicketClosedDate"},"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Human-readable label shown to users for the sorted column.","example":"Closed Date"},"Direction":{"type":"string","description":"Direction applied to the view."},"PageSize":{"type":"integer","description":"Number of rows returned per page when loading the view.","example":50},"Schedules":{"type":"array","description":"Schedules configured for recurring cadence.","properties":{"ViewScheduleId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier of the schedule record.","example":"eb3232a7-9600-4d0d-b0a8-39a7d13bb2d0"},"SiteId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Site that owns the schedule.","example":"0d17ca20-6cb3-4e55-8258-8c0bf0d8c9c4"},"ProductId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Product context for the definition."},"RecurringSchedule":{"allOf":[{"type":"object","description":"Recurring schedule definition that governs when the template auto-creates definition.","example":"99999999-9999-9999-9999-999999999999"},"SiteId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Site that owns the recurring recurrences.","minimum":0,"example":18},"MonthlyDay":{"type":"integer","description":"Calendar day of the month when the template should run (1-31). A value of 0 indicates the pattern uses instance-based rules.","minimum":0,"maximum":31,"example":15}},"required":["RecurringScheduleId","SiteId","CreatedDate","ModifiedDate","Name","Pattern","StartTime","IsValidMonthlyPattern","IsValidQuarterlyPattern","IsMonthlyInstanceBased"],"title":"TicketTemplateRecurringSchedule"}],"description":"Full recurring schedule pattern attached to the view schedule."},"ViewScheduleTypeId":{"type":"string","description":"Schedule type key describing the delivery method (for example, `Email`).","example":"ViewSchedule.Email"},"ExportHost":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Hostname for the export destination when using FTP/SFTP delivery."},"ExportPort":{"type":"integer","nullable":true,"description":"Port used for exporting through FTP/SFTP."},"ExportUid":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Username used to authenticate to the export destination."},"ExportPwd":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Password used to authenticate to the export destination."},"ExportPath":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Directory path where exported files are dropped."},"IsMultiRowExportEnabled":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indicates whether the export should include one row per related record.","example":false},"ExportFormat":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Export file format (for example, `csv`)."},"FilterSetId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Identifier of the saved filter set applied when the schedule runs."},"ExternalUserEmails":{"type":"array","description":"Optional collection of external recipients who should be emailed the export.","items":{"type":"string","format":"email"},"example":["reports@incidentiq.com"]}},"required":["ViewScheduleId","SiteId","ProductId","ViewId","IsEnabled","IsMultiRowExportEnabled"],"title":"ViewSchedule"}},"Sharing":{"allOf":[{"type":"object","description":"Share metadata returned for the current authenticated user. It communicates which access rights were granted and whether the user has responded to an invite.","properties":{"ViewUserId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier of the share assignment when the view is shared with an individual.","example":"b45cef88-22db-48df-9f91-2a95f201fa4b"},"ViewTeamId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Identifier of the share.","example":"3e2ce901-0002-4b1c-b5b3-6f5b91e5f030"},"TeamId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Team receiving the share when the view is distributed to a group."},"Response":{"type":"string","description":"Tracks whether the user accepted the share invitation.","enum":["NoResponse","Accepted","Declined"],"example":"NoResponse"},"Access":{"type":"string","description":"Permission level granted to the recipient.","enum":["View","Edit","Owner"],"example":"View"}},"required":["ViewUserId","CreatedDate","ModifiedDate","ViewId","UserId","Response","Access"],"title":"ViewShareSummary"}],"description":"Share metadata relevant to the authenticated user."}},"required":["ViewId","IsDeleted","SiteId","ProductId","UserId","Name","ViewTypeId","PageSize"],"example":{"ViewId":"0c8f7039-1234-4e7f-9c22-11c25e7b45b2","IsDeleted":false,"SiteId":"b3f792ef-272b-4591-867a-357474046cdd","ProductId":"88df910c-91aa-e711-80c2-0004ffa00010","UserId":"25c1c3ac-0fb7-4214-84a7-87c723ac0052","Name":"Agent Demo Ticket View","ViewTypeId":"Tickets.CustomView","PageSize":50}}}}}

recurrences.","minimum":0,"example":18},"MonthlyDay":{"type":"integer","description":"Calendar day of the month when the template should run (1-31).
